originText:
Hello, my name is Emily, and I am a agent of the hideVPN team, we are creating software with which helps you to hide your ip adress easyly.And also it is free to use for all our users.


We want to know whether it is possible to order advertising on your channel and how much does it cost?
To be honest, I'm not very good at it, but our team has the opportunity to pay well for this.

We are planning to order a video-integration of our software from you, because you have good channel statistics and your videos are well recorded.

This mail is not a spam! And if you are ready to cooperate with us, I am waiting for your answer, thanks.
